psi

Class PsiServerKeyDescriptionFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • psi.PsiServerKeyDescriptionFactory

  • public class PsiServerKeyDescriptionFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    Generates a PsiServerKeyDescription depending on the selected PsiServer implementation, requesting only the variables to be initialized.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static PsiServerKeyDescription createBsServerKeyDescription(java.math.BigInteger privateExponent, java.math.BigInteger publicExponent, java.math.BigInteger modulus)
      Builds a PsiServerKeyDescription that can be used to load or initialize a PsiServer for the BS algorithm.

      Builds a PsiServerKeyDescription that can be used to load or initialize a PsiServer for the ECBS algorithm.
      static PsiServerKeyDescription createEcBsServerKeyDescription(java.lang.String ecPrivateD, java.lang.String ecPublicQ)

      static PsiServerKeyDescription createEcDhServerKeyDescription(java.lang.String ecPrivateD)
      Builds a PsiServerKeyDescription that can be used to load or initialize a PsiServer for the ECDH algorithm.

    • Method Detail

      • createBsServerKeyDescription

        public static PsiServerKeyDescription createBsServerKeyDescription(java.lang.String privateExponent,
                                                                   java.lang.String publicExponent,
                                                                   java.lang.String modulus)
        Builds a PsiServerKeyDescription that can be used to load or initialize a PsiServer for the BS algorithm.
        Parameters:
        privateExponent - String representing the exponent of the server private key
        publicExponent - String representing the exponent of the server public key
        modulus - String representing the modulus of the private and public keys
        Returns:
        the PsiServerKeyDescription built based on the input parameters
